name: Advanced Language Practice: Oral
description: This course offers a consolidation of oral production, aural comprehension and mastery of topic-specific vocabulary that enhance communication skills in various academic contexts and authentic situations. Projects and activities are designed to enable students to develop various types of oral communication skills necessary in formal and academic settings such as professional interview and public speech. [24L, 12P]
exclusions: FSL383H5, FSL443H1, high school French or international Baccalaureate. Not open to native French speakers.
